net.jforum.dao

Interface ModerationDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericModerationDAO, OracleModerationDAO

    public interface ModerationDAO
    Author:
    Rafael Steil

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void aprovePost(int postId)
      Approves a post.
      List categoryPendingModeration()
      Gets information about which categories and foruns have posts to moderate.

    • Method Detail

      • aprovePost

        void aprovePost(int postId)
        Approves a post.
        Parameters:
        postId - The post id to aprove

      • topicsByForum

        Map topicsByForum(int forumId)
        Gets all messages that need moderation.
        Parameters:
        forumId - The forum id to search for messages to mdoerate
        Returns:
        A map instance where the key is the topic id and the value is a TopicModerationInfo instance.

      • categoryPendingModeration

        List categoryPendingModeration()
        Gets information about which categories and foruns have posts to moderate.
        Returns:
        a list instance where each entry is a ModerationPendingInfo instance.
